Title: Venture Global approves investment to build Plaquemines LNG project
Description: US project developer Venture Global has made a final investment decision (FID) to proceed with construction of its 20 mtpa Plaquemines LNG plant, making it the first US LNG project to reach a financial close since Venture Global’s FID on its first LNG plant the 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass in August 2019.
Author: CK

Title: Cheniere agrees 20-year US LNG term supply deal for 0.4 mtpa with Korea’s Posco
Description: US LNG exporter Cheniere has signed a 20-year LNG supply deal for 0.4 mtpa with Korea’s Posco International, with deliveries to start from late 2026.
Author: CK

Title: Price-sensitive Asian LNG buyers likely to emerge for winter supply in 3Q 2022: Woodside
Description: Elevated LNG prices have kept some price-sensitive Asian buyers out of the spot market, but cargo requirements for winter are likely to force them into the market from the third-quarter of the year, Woodside’s chief executive Meg O’ Neill expects.
Author: CK
